p: The study considered the following endpoints for pregnancy outcomes; delivery of a live-born infant with or without birth defects, miscarriage/spontaneous abortion, elective TOP before 20 weeks of gestation, and stillbirth (intrauterine fetal death at or after gestational age of 20 weeks or intrapartum death). The endpoints for children were the following clinical outcomes (by 31st March 2019); healthy or asymptomatic; CZS; OPZRO.
